title: Melissa Lucio's execution delayed by Texas appeals court - The Associated Press
content:
1. Melissa Lucio's execution delayed by Texas appeals court  The Associated Press
  2. Texas court grants stay of execution for death row inmate Melissa Lucio  CNN
  3. Texas Court Halts Execution of Melissa Lucio  The New York Times
  4. Finally! Thank goodness a court stopped death penalty in case of Texas mom Melissa Lucio  Fort Worth Star-Telegram
  5. KHOU 11 legal analyst weighs in on Melissa Lucio stay of execution  KHOU 11

description: HOUSTON (AP) â€” A Texas appeals court on Monday delayed the execution of Melissa Lucio amid growing doubts about whether she fatally beat her 2-year-old daughter  in a case that has garnered the support of lawmakers, celebrities and even some jurors who sentenced her to death.
